"The Treasure Shop":
"About the Treasure Shop

The Treasure Shop is a place where you can purchase unusual items. There is a shop that uses Star Gems and a shop that uses meseta. The product lineup is updated at regular intervals.

You can also spend Star Gems to refresh the product lineup with the \"Update Listings\" button.
